page.description: Shows the main Alpha Five program window.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)
Form Controls (for <OBJECT> use the <CONTROL> pointer or the address of the control)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.SHOW() method causes a window to fill the screen.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example displays, then hides the Customer Information form window.
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.show() ptr.hide()
